triples.name: Replicator equation
triples.relevance: The paper extends the replicator dynamics framework to metric spaces and Banach spaces of finite signed measures.

triples.name: Symmetric game
triples.relevance: The paper studies replicator dynamics for symmetric games as a core application area.

triples.name: Game theory
triples.relevance: Game theory provides the foundational framework for analyzing evolutionary games and Nash equilibria.

triples.name: Nash equilibrium
triples.relevance: The paper establishes relationships between Nash equilibria and stability of replicator dynamics.

triples.name: Oligopoly
triples.relevance: Oligopoly models are cited as a key application domain for the replicator dynamics framework.

triples.name: International trade theory
triples.relevance: International trade theory is identified as an application area for the replicator dynamics framework.

triples.name: Public good
triples.relevance: Public good models are cited as a key application for analyzing strategic interactions via replicator dynamics.

triples.name: Tragedy of the commons
triples.relevance: The tragedy of the commons represents a key problem domain where replicator dynamics can be applied.

triples.name: War of attrition (game)
triples.relevance: The war of attrition game is cited as a specific evolutionary game to which the framework applies.

triples.name: Markov chain
triples.relevance: The paper uses measure-valued Markov processes to approximate replicator dynamics.
